original_text: For some say, “His letters are weighty and forceful, but in person he is unimpressive and his speaking amounts to nothing.”
korean_text: 그들의 말이 그의 편지들은 무게가 있고 힘이 있으나 그가 몸으로 대할 때는 약하고 그 말도 시원하지 않다 하니

sentences.original_text: His letters are weighty and forceful,
but in person he is unimpressive
and his speaking amounts to nothing.
